fields.specializations: Big Five safaris, photographic guiding, cultural tours
fields.bio: Master guide with over a decade guiding in northern Tanzania. Passionate about wildlife photography and natural history interpretation.
fields.qualifications: National Guide Certificate, Wilderness First Aid

fields.bio: Specialist guide focusing on birds and primates. Excellent at spotting and identifying cryptic species.
fields.qualifications: Bird identification diploma, primate tracking course

fields.bio: Experienced trekking guide and cultural interpreter, focused on safe mountain ascents and community-led experiences.
Coastal and cultural specialist guiding tours in Zanzibar and northern Tanzania.

fields.title: Classic Northern Safari — 7 Days
fields.subtitle: Serengeti, Ngorongoro & Tarangire highlights
fields.description: A classic northern circuit safari covering Serengeti, Ngorongoro Crater and Tarangire with game drives and cultural visits.
fields.short_description: 7-day classic northern safari visiting Serengeti, Ngorongoro and Tarangire.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Arrival and transfer to Arusha. Day 2: Tarangire. Day 3–5: Serengeti. Day 6: Ngorongoro Crater. Day 7: Return to Arusha.
fields.accommodation_details: Mid-range lodges and tented camps inclusive of breakfast and dinner.
fields.transportation_details: 4x4 safari vehicle with pop-up roof; transfers included
fields.fitness_requirements: Light walking; suitable for most fitness levels.
fields.vaccination_requirements: Yellow fever if arriving from endemic country; up-to-date routine vaccines
fields.visa_requirements: Tourist visa for Tanzania (check nationality requirements)
fields.meta_description: Serengeti, Ngorongoro and Tarangire 7-day safari — wildlife highlights and cultural experiences.

fields.title: Kilimanjaro Summit Trek — 8 Days (Machame)
fields.subtitle: Machame route to Uhuru Peak
fields.description: 8-day guided ascent of Kilimanjaro via the scenic Machame route with acclimatization and support crew.
fields.short_description: Machame route 8-day Kilimanjaro trek to Uhuru Peak.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day-by-day trekking itinerary including acclimatization and summit push.
fields.accommodation_details: Tented camping on the mountain with sleeping mats and dining tent
fields.transportation_details: Airport transfers to Moshi and trailhead transfers included
fields.fitness_requirements: High — good fitness and recent trekking experience recommended.
fields.equipment_needed: Warm layers, sleeping bag rated to -10°C, trekking boots
fields.meta_description: Guided Machame route ascent of Kilimanjaro with experienced crew and acclimatization plan.

fields.title: Udzungwa Primate & Waterfalls — 3 Days
fields.subtitle: Forest hikes, Sanje Falls and endemic primates
fields.description: Short forest-based trip focusing on endemic primates and Sanje Waterfalls with guided forest walks.
fields.short_description: 3-day Udzungwa rainforest trip for primate enthusiasts and hikers.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Transfer and short walk. Day 2: Full-day primate hike. Day 3: Return.
fields.accommodation_details: Basic lodge accommodation close to park entrance
fields.fitness_requirements: Moderate fitness for forest hikes and stairs to waterfall.
fields.equipment_needed: Hiking shoes, rain jacket, insect repellent
fields.meta_description: 3-day guided tour to see endemic primates and Sanje Waterfalls in Udzungwa Mountains NP.

fields.title: Saadani Beach & Safari — 4 Days
fields.subtitle: Coastal wildlife and beach relaxation
fields.description: Combine a short safari in Saadani National Park with beach time on the Indian Ocean coast.
fields.short_description: 4-day mix of coastal safari and beach time in Saadani NP.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Transfer to Saadani. Day 2: Game drives and boat safari. Day 3: Beach day. Day 4: Return.
fields.meta_description: Short beach and safari combination in Saadani National Park and the Indian Ocean coast.

fields.title: Selous (Nyerere) River Safari — 5 Days
fields.subtitle: Boat safaris and remote wilderness
fields.description: Remote river-based safari in Nyerere National Park (Selous) with boat safaris and walking options.
fields.short_description: 5-day Rufiji river safari with boat trips and remote camp stays.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Itinerary focused on river trips along the Rufiji, game drives and guided walks.
fields.accommodation_details: Riverine lodges and camps with boat access
fields.transportation_details: Charter flights optional; road transfers included where applicable
fields.fitness_requirements: Moderate — some walking and boat transfers.
fields.meta_description: Boat safaris and remote lodge stays in Selous (Nyerere) National Park.

fields.title: Serengeti & Manyara Safari — 6 Days
fields.subtitle: Northern parks wildlife tour
fields.description: Wildlife safari covering Serengeti National Park and Lake Manyara, including game drives and bird watching.
fields.short_description: 6-day safari visiting Serengeti and Lake Manyara.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Transfer to Manyara. Day 2: Morning game drive at Manyara; drive to Serengeti. Day 3–4: Serengeti game drives. Day 5: Morning game drive, return to Manyara. Day 6: Return to Arusha.
fields.accommodation_details: Safari lodges with views over the parks
fields.fitness_requirements: Light walking; suitable for all fitness levels.
fields.vaccination_requirements: Yellow fever if needed; routine vaccines
fields.meta_description: Wildlife safari in Serengeti and Lake Manyara National Parks.

fields.title: Ruaha & Mikumi Safari — 5 Days
fields.subtitle: Southern parks adventure
fields.description: Safari focusing on Ruaha and Mikumi National Parks in southern Tanzania, renowned for elephants and predators.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Fly to Iringa, drive to Ruaha. Day 2–3: Game drives in Ruaha. Day 4: Transfer to Mikumi, evening drive. Day 5: Morning game drive, fly back to Dar es Salaam.
fields.fitness_requirements: Moderate; some walking on bush paths.
fields.meta_description: Safari through Ruaha and Mikumi National Parks.

fields.title: Katavi Wilderness Safari — 5 Days
fields.subtitle: Remote wildlife adventure in Katavi
fields.description: Off-the-beaten-path safari in Katavi National Park, known for large herds of game in a remote wilderness.
fields.short_description: 5-day Katavi NP safari exploring pristine wilderness.
highlights: Big herds of buffalo and elephants
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Flight to Katavi, camp. Day 2: Full-day game drives. Day 3: Game drives, walking safari. Day 4: Boat trip on Lake Chada. Day 5: Departure.
fields.fitness_requirements: Moderate walking; comfortable for active travelers.
fields.meta_description: Remote wildlife safari in Katavi NP with game drives and walking.

fields.title: Gombe & Mahale Chimp Trek — 6 Days
fields.subtitle: Tracking chimpanzees in their forest habitat
fields.description: Trek through the forests of Gombe Stream and Mahale Mountains National Parks to observe wild chimpanzee communities.
fields.short_description: 6-day primate trekking adventure in Gombe and Mahale.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Fly to Kigoma, transfer to Gombe. Day 2: Chimp trekking in Gombe. Day 3: Boat to Mahale. Day 4–5: Chimp trekking in Mahale. Day 6: Return to Kigoma.
fields.transportation_details: Domestic flight to Kigoma; boat transfers
fields.fitness_requirements: High — steep trails and forest terrain.
fields.equipment_needed: Hiking boots, long-sleeve shirt, rain gear
fields.meta_description: Chimpanzee trekking experience in Gombe Stream and Mahale Mountains National Parks.

fields.title: Zanzibar Spice & Stone Town Tour — 4 Days
fields.subtitle: History, spices and culture of Unguja Island
fields.description: Experience the spice plantations, historic Stone Town, and beaches of Zanzibar on this cultural tour.
fields.short_description: 4-day Zanzibar cultural and spice tour including Stone Town.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Stone Town, evening tour. Day 2: Spice plantation visit. Day 3: Guided Stone Town walking tour. Day 4: Beach and departure.
fields.accommodation_details: Stone Town hotel and coastal lodge
fields.fitness_requirements: Light walking in town and plantation.
fields.meta_title: Zanzibar Spice & Stone Town Tour — 4 Days
fields.meta_description: Explore Zanzibar's spice farms, cultural Stone Town and beaches.

fields.title: Kitulo Flower Safari — 3 Days
fields.subtitle: Wildflowers of the Southern Highlands
fields.description: Short excursion to Kitulo National Park, famous for its colorful wildflower displays.
fields.short_description: 3-day Kitulo Plateau wildflower tour in Tanzania's southern highlands.
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Travel to Kitulo, afternoon walk. Day 2: Full-day flower viewing hike. Day 3: Morning hike, return to Mbeya.
fields.fitness_requirements: Moderate walking; mostly on grassy trails.
fields.meta_description: Guided tour to Kitulo National Park to see seasonal wildflowers and highland scenery.

fields.title: Mafia Island Dive & Safari — 4 Days
fields.subtitle: Beach, boat safari and marine park
fields.description: Experience the coastal wildlife of Mafia Island Marine Park with boat trips and beach relaxation.
fields.short_description: 4-day Mafia Island tour with snorkeling and village visits.
highlights: Mangrove and sea grass boat safari
fields.detailed_itinerary: Day 1: Arrival in Dar, transfer to Mafia. Day 2: Snorkeling/whale sharks, mangrove boat safari. Day 3: Jahazi reef snorkeling, beach. Day 4: Return to Dar.
fields.fitness_requirements: Light — snorkeling and short walks on beaches.
fields.meta_description: Beach and marine safari in Mafia Island Marine Park with snorkeling and wildlife.

fields.title: Arrival & Tarangire
fields.description: Arrival in Arusha then transfer to Tarangire for afternoon game drive.

fields.title: Serengeti Transfer & Game Drive
fields.description: Drive to Serengeti with en route game viewing and afternoon drives in Seronera.

fields.title: Moshi Arrival & Trek Prep
fields.description: Arrival to Moshi, kit check and briefing with guide and crew.

fields.title: Summit & Descent
fields.description: Pre-dawn summit push to Uhuru Peak, then descent to Mweka and transfer to Moshi.

fields.title: Full-Day Primate Hike
fields.description: Guided forest walk to see Sanje Mangabey and Udzungwa red colobus plus waterfalls.

fields.title: Arrival
fields.description: Arrival at Manyara, evening rest.

fields.title: Game Drive - Manyara
fields.description: Full day game drive in Lake Manyara NP.

fields.title: Return to Arusha
fields.description: Morning game drive and return to Arusha.

fields.title: Arrival & Ruaha
fields.description: Fly to Iringa and transfer to Ruaha NP.

fields.title: Game Drive - Ruaha
fields.description: Full day game drives in Ruaha NP.

fields.title: Return to Dar
fields.description: Morning game drive, then fly back to Dar es Salaam.

fields.title: Arrival & Camp Setup
fields.description: Fly into Katavi airstrip, meet your guide and set up camp near Lake Chada.

fields.title: Game Drives
fields.description: Full day game drives through Katavi's plains and riverbeds.

fields.title: Walking Safari
fields.description: Guided walking safari in the afternoon to see smaller fauna up close.

fields.title: Boat Trip on Lake Chada
fields.description: Morning boat safari on Lake Chada to see hippos, crocodiles and waterbirds.

fields.title: Departure
fields.description: Morning game drive, then return charter flight to Dar es Salaam.

fields.title: Arrival at Gombe
fields.description: Fly to Kigoma, boat transfer and short walk to Gombe camp.

fields.title: Chimp Trekking in Gombe
fields.description: Track wild chimpanzees in Gombe's forest with an experienced tracker.

fields.title: Transfer to Mahale
fields.description: Boat transfer to Mahale; afternoon at leisure on the beach.

fields.title: Chimp Trekking in Mahale
fields.description: Morning and afternoon chimp trekking in the Mahale forest.

fields.title: Lake Walk & Relax
fields.description: Optional morning hike to chimp sleeping trees, then afternoon leisure.

fields.title: Return to Dar
fields.description: Morning at leisure, afternoon boat and flight back to Dar es Salaam.

fields.title: Arrival & Stone Town Walk
fields.description: Arrival in Zanzibar, guided evening walk through historic Stone Town.

fields.title: Spice Plantation
fields.description: Visit a working spice farm, learn about spices and tropical fruits with tastings.

fields.title: Stone Town Exploration
fields.description: Guided walking tour of Stone Town's markets, architecture and old fort.

fields.title: Beach & Departure
fields.description: Relax on the beach in the morning, transfer to airport for departure.

fields.title: Travel to Kitulo
fields.description: Drive from Mbeya to Kitulo National Park, afternoon acclimatization walk.

fields.title: Wildflower Viewing
fields.description: Full-day hike across meadows to see the highland blooms and scenery.

fields.title: Return to Mbeya
fields.description: Morning hike to a viewpoint, then drive back to Mbeya.

fields.title: Arrival in Mafia
fields.description: Fly to Mafia Island, afternoon at leisure on the beach.

fields.title: Marine Park Safari
fields.description: Morning snorkeling or whale shark boat trip, afternoon mangrove boat safari.

fields.title: Jahazi Reef
fields.description: Full day trip to Jahazi reef for snorkeling and fish feeding demonstration.

fields.title: Return to Dar
fields.description: Morning relax on the beach, afternoon flight back to Dar es Salaam.

fields.caption: Lake Chada in Katavi National Park
The Old Fort in Stone Town

fields.notes: Good summit weather historically in September.
Forest trails may be muddy after heavy rain; boots recommended.
Best time for game viewing as vegetation is low.
Ideal for primate activity; check boat schedules.
Peak season for Zanzibar beach; book early.
Flower season starts January; ideal flowering in Feb-Mar.

fields.name: Single Room Upgrade
fields.description: Upgrade to private single room (subject to availability).

fields.name: Sleeping Bag Rental (seasonal)
fields.description: High-quality sleeping bag rental for mountain trek.

fields.name: Hot Air Balloon (Serengeti)
fields.description: Early morning hot air balloon flight over the Serengeti (subject to availability).

fields.name: Seafood Dinner
fields.description: Fresh seafood dinner on the beach (per person).

fields.name: Guided Boating Safari
fields.description: Private boat safari on Lake Chada for up to 4 guests.

fields.name: Canoe Safari
fields.description: Canoe trip on the lake in Mahale to watch chimp families (per person).

fields.name: Spice Cooking Class
fields.description: Learn to cook traditional Zanzibari dishes with local chefs.

fields.name: Scuba Diving Gear Rental
fields.description: Full scuba diving gear rental for one dive (certified divers only).
